CHAPTER 10 - TESTIMONIAL EVIDENCE, IN GENERAL (Rule 130, Rules of Admissibility. Sections 21 to 23)

CHAPTER 12 - PRIVILEGED COMMUNICATIONS (Rule 130, Rules of Admissibility, Sections 24 to 26)
